attributes.action: Keep Prime Minster Brown as leader of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the traitors of the labour party need to be removed. 
 they are tring to have Coup d'état of  the goverment of the united kingdom. 
we the people and the prime minster must stand strong, we must not let them win. 
be strong all and we will survive.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
